typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
